page.title: 06BRAISHFIELD AREA SCHOOLS
page.content:
There is one County Primary School in Braishfield, the Headmaster is Mr. Miles. At present the school caters for 78 pupils aged 5-11 years of age with 3 full time and 1 part time staff.
The Rowans nursery School, Ampfield, whose principal is Mrs. Claire Ludwell caters for 6 local children under 5 years of age.She teaches the basics of education in a schoolroom which has been converted from a garage, and has been opened since 1973.
State education for pupils aged 11_16 years of age continues at Romsey School.
